sentences.en: a lack of management skills
sentences.cn: 缺乏管理技巧

sentences.en: a management consultant
sentences.cn: 一个管理顾问

sentences.en: Each unit including the parent company has its own, local management.
sentences.cn: 包括母公司在内，每个单位都有自己的地方管理层。

sentences.en: He is a firm believer in total quality management.
sentences.cn: 他是个极力主张全面质量管理的人。

sentences.en: He is known for his political savvy and strong management skills.
sentences.cn: 他以睿智的政治头脑和强势的管理手腕出名。

sentences.en: He lacked any of the practical common sense essential in management.
sentences.cn: 管理方面基本的实用常识他一点也不懂。

sentences.en: Increasingly, corporate clients are seeking to outsource the management of their facilities.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的公司客户寻求将设施的管理外包出去。

sentences.en: It is thought that a management buyout is one option.
sentences.cn: 管理层收购被认为是一种选择。

sentences.en: Management is confident about the way business is progressing.
sentences.cn: 管理层对业务发展的态势充满信心。

sentences.en: management training courses
sentences.cn: 管理培训课程

sentences.en: My workmates, and, even more, the management, didn't want me to leave.
sentences.cn: 我的同事，甚至包括管理层都不想让我离开。

sentences.en: That's John Gibb, operations chief for New York Emergency Management.
sentences.cn: 那个人是约翰·吉布，纽约应急管理办公室的行动总指挥官。

sentences.en: The current division of labor between workers and management will alter.
sentences.cn: 当前工人与管理部门的分工将会改变。

sentences.en: The firm decided to bring in a new management team.
sentences.cn: 该公司决定聘请新的管理团队。

sentences.en: The governors were joined by Mr Hunter and his management team.
sentences.cn: 亨特先生及他率领的管理小组加入了州长们的队伍。

sentences.en: The management has agreed to the policy.
sentences.cn: 管理层同意了这项政策。

sentences.en: The management tries to produce the magazine as cost-effectively as possible.
sentences.cn: 管理层试图尽可能地让杂志盈利。

sentences.en: The successful applicant will have experience in project management.
sentences.cn: 成功的求职者需要有从事项目管理的经验。

sentences.en: The whole thing was a masterpiece of crowd management.
sentences.cn: 整件事情就是人群管理的典范。

sentences.en: Universities are dipping their toes in the waters of management education.
sentences.cn: 各大学正开始尝试进入管理教育领域。

words.tran_cn: 易管理的；易控制的；易办的
操纵；给…配置人员；使增强勇气；在…就位
[管理]管理；管理人员；管理部门；操纵；经营手段

phrases.tran_cn: 人力资源管理；人力调配
物业管理；资产管理；物业管理专员

trans.tran_cn: 经营，管理（方式），管理者/部门
trans.tran_en: the activity of controlling and organizing the work that a company or organization does
